mapper.select: select count(board_num) from board where mem_num =#{mem_num}
select * from (select rownum rnum, board.* from (select * from board where mem_num=#{mem_num} order by board_num desc) board) where rnum >= ((#{page} -1) * 10+1) and rnum <= (#{page} *10)
select count(re_num) from reply where mem_num =#{mem_num}
select * from (select rownum rnum, reply.* from (select * from reply where mem_num=#{mem_num} order by re_num desc) reply) where rnum >= ((#{page}-1) * 10+1) and rnum <= (#{page} *10)
select count(gb_num) from goodandbad where mem_num=#{mem_num} and gb_sort='g'

select * from (select rownum rnum, goodandbad.* from (select g.gb_num, g.board_num, g.mem_num, g.gb_sort, b.board_title,b.board_date,b.board_count, m.mem_nick from goodandbad g left join board b on g.board_num = b.board_num left join member m on g.mem_num = m.mem_num where g.mem_num=#{mem_num} and gb_sort ='g' group by g.gb_num, g.board_num, g.mem_num,g.gb_sort, b.board_title,b.board_date,b.board_count, m.mem_nick order by gb_num desc )goodandbad ) where rnum >= ((#{page} - 1) * 10+1) and rnum <=(#{page} * 10)
